title: Found in Fort Worth
content:
Having found inspiration in the many found-type images I’ve seen, I decided to step out and taket a walk through downtown Fort Worth. These images, for various reasons, were the most memorable to me. Hope you enjoy—please comment if you like.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_6190121_6102.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_6190124_5892.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_6190127_6228.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_6190129_5716.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_6190132_5454.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_6190134_4671.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_6190135_3946.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_6190136_4658.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/_6190137_5850.jpg)
author: jupiterboy

comments.content:
I had to capture a bit of the local flavor on a recent trip to St. John.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/SJ004_4650.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ST006_4464.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/SJ005_5716.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907001952im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ST007_3799.jpg)
These are all great specimens, James. Well chosen.

Although I would like to be standing exactly where that wave is hitting in St. John, that first photo is probably my favorite. It just looks like Texas, probably smells like it too! (no offense, I’ve lived there for a bit)Even the old holes for the neon resemble bullet holes from the old west. The only thing missing from it is a tumble weed! Great shot, or should I say “catching Texas in one shot”

-Lou

-Do what you love and then do it some more
